markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Weapon Supremacy](/Feats.aspx?ID=429) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 153 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your skill with weapons lets you attack swiftly at all times. You’re permanently quickened. You can use your extra action only to Strike.
name: Weapon Supremacy
